name: Time Leap (PENGSO0O, Dallasocoggins, SolarisDreams, peterschlenker)
description:
TIME LEAP

Created by Team 25 for the 2021 Fall TAGD Game Jam

Peter Schlenker, Madison Sutton, Dallas Coggins, and Casey Pei

IMPORTANT - 

  • two player
    • on one keyboard
  • platformer
  • racing

Controls - 

Player 1 

  • WASD - movement
  • left shift - dash
  • left ctrl - use powerup

Player 2

  • arrow keys - movement
  • right shift - dash
  • right ctrl - use powerup

NOTE: Both players were configured to work with a game controller but for best results keyboard is preferred
